meanings.definition: The quality or state of being visible or able to be seen between two or more points or objects.
meanings.sent1: The intervisibilities of the stars in the night sky fascinated the young astronomer.
meanings.sent2: The intervisibilities of the mountain range were obstructed by thick fog.
meanings.sent3: The intervisibilities of the hide-and-seek players made the game more challenging.
meanings.sent4: The intervisibilities of the city lights created a beautiful skyline.
meanings.sent5: The intervisibilities of the colorful fish in the aquarium captivated the children.

meanings.definition: The extent to which one object or point can be seen from another.
meanings.sent1: The intervisibilities between the two lighthouses helped sailors navigate safely.
meanings.sent2: The intervisibilities of the distant island were limited by the thick mist.
meanings.sent3: The intervisibilities of the cat stalking the bird were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The intervisibilities of the truth became clearer as the investigation progressed.
meanings.sent5: The intervisibilities of the road ahead were obscured by the heavy rain.
